structs

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • structs.Handle
      • structs.Shader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resettable

    public class Shader
extends Handle
implements Resettable
    Represents a shader program with a vertex and fragment shader. A shader is a program written in GLSL that instructs OpenGL how to render a certain part of the rendering process. Information about shaders obtained from https://learnopengl.com/Getting-started/Shaders

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shader

        public Shader(java.lang.String vsPath,
              java.lang.String fsPath)
        Construct a shader program. The vertex shader determines the coordinates at which the vertices should be drawn. The fragment shader determines the color of each pixel.
        Parameters:
        vsPath - Path to vertex shader file.
        fsPath - Path to fragment shader file.
